% Reference TikZ for pipeline diagram test fixture
% This is a simplified version of the deviation-bound figure
\begin{tikzpicture}[
    every node/.append style={
        align=center,
        font=\sffamily\footnotesize,
    },
    block/.style={
        draw=blue!40!black,
        fill=blue!5,
        rounded corners=3pt,
        minimum width=2.5cm,
        minimum height=1.5cm,
        thick,
    },
    arrow/.style={
        ->,
        >=Stealth,
        thick,
        draw=blue!40!black,
    },
    label/.style={
        font=\sffamily\footnotesize\color{blue!60!black},
    },
]
% Blocks
\node[block] (s1) {Step 1};
\node[block, right=0.5cm of s1] (s2) {Step 2};
\node[block, right=0.5cm of s2] (s3) {Step 3};

% Arrows
\draw[arrow] (s1) -- (s2);
\draw[arrow] (s2) -- (s3);

% Labels
\node[label, below=2pt of s1] {First stage};
\node[label, below=2pt of s2] {Second stage};
\node[label, below=2pt of s3] {Third stage};
\end{tikzpicture}
